participants.name: Dr. Paul Jeffrey D.C
participants.title: Doctor of Chiropractic at AZ Chiropractic

messages.message: I appreciate the connection Brian. I am the treating chiropractor at a newer clinic in the area. I wanted to offer you an opportunity to come and check out our clinic. For an adjustment and a half hour massage from one of our licensed massage therapists it will only be $20. We are located at 4575 E. Cactus Road, Phoenix. Open 9am-6:30pm weekdays and Sat 9am-1pm. If you are interested let me know what day/time will work for you this week. Have a great day
Thank you. I'll consider this. Been a while since I had an adjustment. ;)

If you would be still interested, I will allow a free adjustment and a free half hour massage. Just let me know if today or a day coming up would work for you. We are open weekdays 9am-6:30pm and Saturdays 9am-1pm. Thank you
Thank you for the invite. I'll try to spread the word too.
